text: Antônio Carlos Konder Reis (16 December 1924 – 12 June 2018) was a Brazilian politician. He was born in Itajaí, Santa Catarina. He served as Senator from 1963 to 1975, a Deputy (1955–1963, 1987–1991, 1998–2003), and Governor of Santa Catarina from 1975 to 1979 and briefly again from 1994 to 1995. Konder Reis died on 12 June 2018 in Itajaí at the age of 93.Morre o ex-governador de SC Antônio Carlos Konder Reis ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Santa Catarina
title: Antônio Carlos Konder Reis
